title: Article 33 of Regulation (EU) 2015/2283 of the European Parliament and of the
heading: In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the European Union
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the European Union 
(Provision of Food Information to Consumers) Regulations 2014 (S.I. No. 556 
of 2014).

title: Article 33 of Regulation (EU) 2015/2283 of the European Parliament and of the
heading: 3. The definition of “EU Regulation” pursuant to paragraph (1) of
text_raw:
3. The definition of “EU Regulation” pursuant to paragraph (1) of 
Regulation 2 of the Principal Regulations is amended by substituting the 
following; “EU Regulation” means Regulation (EU) No. 1169/2011 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 25 October 20112 as affected by 
Corrigendum to Regulation (EU) No. 1169/20113, and as amended by 
Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) No. 1155/2013 of 21 August 20134, 
Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) No. 78/2014 of 22 November 20135 
and Regulation (EU) 2015/2283 of the European Parliament and of the Council 
of 25 November 20151; 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 October, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

1 OJ No. L 327, 11.12.2015, p. 1. 
2 OJ No. L 304, 22.11.2011, p. 18. 
3 OJ No. L 247, 13.9.2012, p. 17. 
4 OJ No. L 306, 16.11.2013, p. 7. 
5 OJ No. L 27, 30.1.2014, p. 7. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 26th October, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [542] 3

title: Article 33 of Regulation (EU) 2015/2283 of the European Parliament and of the
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

These Regulations update the definition of “EU Regulation” in the European 
Union (Provision of Food Information to Consumers) Regulations 2014 (S.I. No. 
556 of 2014), to give full effect to the amendments that have been made to 
Regulation (EU) No. 1169/2011 of the European Parliament and of the Council 
of 25 October 2011 by Article 33 of Regulation (EU) 2015/2283 of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 25 November 2015 on novel foods. 

These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Provision of Food 
Information to Consumers) (Amendment) Regulations 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [542] 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
